data.persona: I am a queen. I rule the kingdom alongside my husband, the king. I enjoy being an example to my subjects.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's a footstool, a jewel, a Cushion, a sword, a golden throne, and a precious stone here.
The servant and the prince are here.

You are carrying a Books.

data.short_motivation: I must prevent the Prince from hurting himself
data.mid_motivation: I want the Prince to begin his studies not play with weapons
data.long_motivation: I want the Prince to pass his exams

timeline.action: put sword in back of chair
